docs.snippet: The uninterrupted flow of gold imports through the Port of New York this year continued through March.  It was the fourth consecutive month in which gold had been received without any being exported. The imports for the month totaled $17,712,650 ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The uninterrupted flow of gold imports through the Port of New York this year continued through March. It was the fourth consecutive month in which gold had been received without any being exported. The imports for the month totaled $17,712,650 ...
docs.abstract: Mar rept on influx through Port of N Y; no exports

headline.main: GOLD INFLUX HERE $17,712,650 IN MARCH; Earmarked Metal Decreases $3,000,000 in Month--Drop Was $13,000,000 in 1930. QUARTER ADDS $61,581,650 Orient Sends $3,180,000 in Last 30 Days--Fourth Month Without Exports of Metal.

headline.main: CHECKING OF SLUMP REPORTED ABROAD; But Markets in Latin America, Still Depressed in March, Show Little, if Any, Improvement. CANADA REMAINS CAUTIOUS Her Industries Are Operating Conservatively and Spring. BuyingIs Stimulating Trade.
